Text: Thought for a moment this was a new Issue but this one was out months ago.  Please can we see Part 4 soon!
Fourth issue will be out this week.

I've heard that many many times, i will not hold my breath but i hope.

Also what about the Charmed Comics.  Isn't Issue 0 out yet?
Thanks! I know you're doing what you can

Well, right now I guess it WILL be out. There's  already a preview for it.

Charmed #0 WAS out, but I never saw any scans.
Ok thanks for that information, if you see anything of Charmed send me word i would appreciate it.
